title: Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood Sees Crypto Market Exploding to $25 Trillion in 2030
description: Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood says the crypto ecosystem will be dominated by bitcoin and ether and will scale from about $1 trillion today to $25 trillion in 2030. “The regulatory breakthrough is very important to bring institutions online,” said the asset manager, emphasizing that the partnership between Blackrock, the world’s largest asset manager, and […]

title: How is AI Revolutionizing Security in Emerging Markets?
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of security integration, artificial intelligence (AI) stands as a beacon, guiding systems integrators toward novel projects and market trends. As the year comes to a close, the intersection of AI, video analytics, and proactive deterrence is redefining safety and security across various sectors. title: Exclusive Report: Different Views on Regulating AI Data Access
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has catalyzed a new frontier of technological advancement, where the capacity for innovation seems limitless. At the core of this burgeoning field is data—vast quantities—fueling the algorithms that drive AI systems. As such, the access to and use of this data have become central points of contention, raising critical questions about privacy, ... Read more
